name: The Last One (itch) (Carles González)
description:
The Last One About the game:

The Last One is a survival crafting game where your gang have been murdered by the rival gang. You have the mission of running away from your hood, it's the only way to survive. 

To escape you will have to find resources so you can elaborate different objects that can help you reach your objective. 

Craftings:

There are craftings for helping you eliminate your oponents like molotovs and guns, there are craftings focused in your defence like life best and bendages, and others crucial to escape like climbing gloves.


Resources:

To find resources for crafting you will find them mostly in garbages, drums, etc. But you will also recieve some eliminating oponents. Once you have enough, search the nearest crafting table.  


All craftings: All resources:

Credits: 
Carles González: Programmer
Àngel Rulo: Artist
